backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining file, note, folder, mission, and authorization types with state maps and health/diagnostic query methods plus mixed‑in storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of brief summaries describing the purpose and behavior of numerous frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation describing the creation of a draft baseline identical to Live version 114 and outlining validation steps and change control.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base colors and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, and loading the React app root.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change‑freeze notice stating that no code changes are allowed post‑restoration until explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app name, theme, icons, and metadata for MyGallery.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, network-first fetch handling, and runtime cache cleanup for the PWA.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist confirming all frontend files and behaviors match Live version 114 after restoration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing theme, providers, identity initialization, and intro screen logic.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing detailed error states for actor initialization with retry and logout options.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG-based animated gallery icon featuring target rings, crosshairs, and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty component file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed subtle bottom border line used as a decorative UI element.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog prompting users to retry opening a file or download it when the browser blocks external opening.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog component that previews files by type and provides actions like download, delete, and moving files.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: UI section for uploading files, creating links, and creating notes with progress tracking and validation.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that triggers folder-related actions with a folder icon.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated dialog for listing, creating, renaming, and deleting folders with swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full-screen folder management view supporting creation, editing, deletion, and selection.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full-screen viewer for browsing files with swipe navigation and actions like delete, download, share, and move.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays files and notes in a gallery with selection, long-press, previews, and folder/mission actions.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with theme toggle, authentication menu, and a progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows a brief animated splash screen and fades out before calling onComplete.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link can't open, offering retry or copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button for signing in with Internet Identity, showing loading state while logging in.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission view allowing title editing, task management, autosave, and viewing attached files and notes.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title input and task list editing before saving.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens missions, with hover effects and disabled state handling.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen mission list UI with mission selection, creation, deletion, progress calculation, and swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Simple wrapper that constrains its children to a mobile-only container layout.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for moving files or notes into a selected mission with mutation handling and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog for viewing a note and performing actions such as download, share, send to folder/mission, or delete.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving or removing files/notes from folders, including performance diagnostics and mutation coordination.
Reusable component enabling swipe-to-reveal edit/delete actions with pointer-gesture handling.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Global upload progress bar showing total progress and item count when uploads are active.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Renders an intro screen with a target-themed SVG graphic, descriptive text, and a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Provides a context for managing backend actor initialization, retry logic, error handling, and sign‑out behavior.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Manages upload batches, progress updates, and completion state with batched animation‑frame progress updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor via React Query, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer such as touch input.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Provides debounced autosave for mission edits with change detection, queued saves, and mission‑switch resets.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating missions with backend actor integration and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for creating, fetching, deleting, and moving notes, with cache invalidation tied to folders and missions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and managing files and folders, including uploads, mission associations, and folder creation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light and dark mode design tokens and base styling rules.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the main homepage UI, fetching core data and handling folder and mission views with conditional layouts and smoke test logic.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Provides standardized actor initialization error messages and functions to classify errors such as not-ready, initialization failure, invalid admin token, and stopped canister.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Implements external URL opening, file downloading, text-note exporting, and Web Share API helpers with popup-block detection.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open based on MIME category, including viewer vs download logic and office document handling.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes MIME types into previewable groups and provides human-readable labels for file types.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Performs BigInt‑safe equality comparison of Task arrays by checking IDs, text, and completion state.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty file placeholder with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Implements optional performance diagnostics with timing, logging, and async operation measurement controlled by flags.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Provides diagnostics for React Query mission caches and logs delete mutation lifecycle events and errors.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs end‑to‑end smoke tests for core flows including folder creation, mission creation, file upload, and verification steps.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Implements a simple promise concurrency limiter with a queue and helper factory function.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and enabling typography and animation plugins.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical list of all frontend files that define the Live version 114 baseline for drift detection.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing required fixes to Mission task creation, task toggling, and swipe-to-delete behavior, with scope and feature tracking.
